price: Kuma dã sun yi nufin fita, dã sun yi wani tattali sabõda shi, kuma amma Allah Ya ƙi zãburarsu, sai Ya nauyayar da zamansu. Kuma aka ce ku zauna tãre da mãsu* zama.
arabic: ۞ وَلَوۡ أَرَادُواْ ٱلۡخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّواْ لَهُۥ عُدَّةٗ وَلَٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمۡ فَثَبَّطَهُمۡ وَقِيلَ ٱقۡعُدُواْ مَعَ ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ
footnotes: * Watau mãtã da yãra da gajiyayyu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw arādū al-khurūja la-aʿaddū lahu ʿuddatan walākin kariha al-lahu inbiʿāthahum fathabbaṭahum waqīla uq'ʿudū maʿa al-qāʿidīna
translations: so He made them lag behind
